name: Dragon IX - Retribution (Demo Version 1)
description:
Dragon IX The fourth chapter in the series of the Dragon Trilogy. 

You are a warrior named Arya Sparks who woke up in a cavern faced against the greatest enemy of the Kalathean Nation. Geerberanth, Now you must find the answers of the past and reunite the world to destroy Geerberanth Once and for all.

This demo is missing a lot but I hope you still enjoy it. As it is a taste of what is to come.
